languages.text: "Техноматы проинспектировали сервиторов и пришли к выводу, что те не представляют опасности. По словам слуг Омниссии, подобное поведение — отголоски не до конца уничтоженных разумов или проявление воли машинных духов. Тем не менее, сбоящие сервиторы существенно осложняют работу команды, и Высокий фактотум, Янрис Данрок хотел бы обсудить с вами, как надлежит поступить с дефективным имуществом. Он ожидает вашей аудиенции на капитанском мостике".

traits.locale_text: "Техноматы проинспектировали сервиторов и пришли к выводу, что те не представляют опасности. По словам слуг Омниссии, подобное поведение — отголоски не до конца уничтоженных разумов или проявление воли машинных духов. Тем не менее, сбоящие сервиторы существенно осложняют работу команды, и Высокий Фактотум, Янрис Данрок хотел бы обсудить с вами, как надлежит поступить с дефективным имуществом. Он ожидает вашей аудиенции на капитанском мостике".

languages.text: "The technomats inspected the servitors and concluded they pose no danger. According to the servants of the Omnissiah, such behaviour is caused either by the echoes of minds not completely eliminated or by manifestations of the machine spirits' will. Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew's tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."
languages.original_text: "Техноматы проинспектировали сервиторов и пришли к выводу, что те не представляют опасности. Он ожидает вашей аудиенции на капитанском мостике".

traits.locale_text: "The technomats inspected the servitors and concluded they pose no danger. According to the servants of the Omnissiah, such behaviour is caused by the echoes of minds that had not been completely eliminated or by the manifestations of the machine spirits' will. Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."

Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew's tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."

languages.text: « Les technomates chargés d'inspecter les servitors ont conclu qu'ils ne présentaient aucun danger. Si l'on en croit les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, ces dysfonctionnements seraient l'écho d'esprits n'ayant pas été totalement éliminés, ou la manifestation de la volonté propre des esprits de la machine. Quoi qu'il en soit, les servitors défectueux compliquent grandement la tâche de l'équipage, et le haut factotum Janris Danrok aimerait s'entretenir de la marche à suivre avec vous. Il vous attend sur la passerelle. »
languages.original_text: "The technomats inspected the servitors and concluded they pose no danger. According to the servants of the Omnissiah, such behaviour is caused either by the echoes of minds not completely eliminated or by manifestations of the machine spirits' will. Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew's tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: « Les technomates chargés d'inspecter les servitors ont conclu qu'ils ne présentaient aucun danger. Si l'on en croit les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, ces dysfonctionnements seraient l'écho d'esprits n'ayant pas été totalement éliminés, ou la manifestation de la volonté propre des esprits de la machine. Quoi qu'il en soit, les servitors défectueux compliquent grandement la tâche de l'équipage, et le haut factotum Janris Danrok aimerait s'entretenir de la marche à suivre avec vous. Il vous attend sur la passerelle. »

languages.text: "Die Technomaten haben die Servitoren inspiziert und sind zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass sie keine Gefahr darstellen. Laut den Dienern des Omnissiah wird solches Verhalten entweder durch den Widerhall eines nicht vollständig eliminierten Verstands hervorgerufen oder durch Manifestationen des Willens der Maschinengeister. Wie dem auch sei, die fehlerhaften Servitoren machen die Arbeit der Crew deutlich schwieriger. Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok möchte besprechen, wie er mit dem defekten Eigentum umgehen soll. Er erwartet auf der Brücke Eure Audienz."
languages.original_text: "The technomats inspected the servitors and concluded they pose no danger. According to the servants of the Omnissiah, such behaviour is caused either by the echoes of minds not completely eliminated or by manifestations of the machine spirits' will. Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew's tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Die Technomaten haben die Servitoren inspiziert und sind zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass sie keine Gefahr darstellen. Laut den Dienern des Omnissiah wird solches Verhalten entweder durch den Widerhall eines nicht vollständig eliminierten Verstands hervorgerufen oder durch Manifestationen des Willens der Maschinengeister. Wie dem auch sei, die fehlerhaften Servitoren machen die Arbeit der Crew deutlich schwieriger. Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok möchte besprechen, wie er mit dem defekten Eigentum umgehen soll. Er erwartet auf der Brücke Eure Audienz."

languages.text: «Los tecnómatas han inspeccionado los servidores y concluido que no suponen ningún peligro. Según los sirvientes del Omnissiah, dicho comportamiento es la causa de ecos de mentes que no se han eliminado por completo o manifestaciones de la voluntad de los espíritus máquinas. Sea lo que sea, los servidores defectuosos dificultan por completo el trabajo de la tripulación, y al Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok le gustaría discutir qué debemos hacer con ellos. Le está esperando en el puente».
languages.original_text: "The technomats inspected the servitors and concluded they pose no danger. According to the servants of the Omnissiah, such behaviour is caused either by the echoes of minds not completely eliminated or by manifestations of the machine spirits' will. Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew's tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: «Los tecnómatas han inspeccionado los servidores y concluido que no suponen ningún peligro. Según los sirvientes del Omnissiah, dicho comportamiento es la causa de ecos de mentes que no se han eliminado por completo o manifestaciones de la voluntad de los espíritus máquinas. Sea lo que sea, los servidores defectuosos dificultan por completo el trabajo de la tripulación, y al Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok le gustaría discutir qué debemos hacer con ellos. Le está esperando en el puente».

languages.text: “技工检查了那些机仆，认为它们不会造成危险。根据欧姆尼塞亚仆从的说法，这种行为要么是由于思想回声没有被完全抹除，要么由于机魂的意志造成的。尽管如此，由于机仆出了问题，船员们的工作遇到了很多困难。高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克希望讨论一下该如何处理这些有缺陷的财产，他正在舰桥等待您的接见。”
languages.original_text: "The technomats inspected the servitors and concluded they pose no danger. According to the servants of the Omnissiah, such behaviour is caused either by the echoes of minds not completely eliminated or by manifestations of the machine spirits' will. Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew's tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: “技工检查了那些奴工，认为它们不会造成危险。根据欧姆尼塞亚仆从的说法，这种行为要么是由于思想回声没有被完全抹除，要么由于机魂的意志造成的。尽管如此，由于奴工出了问题，船员们的工作遇到了很多困难。高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克希望讨论一下该如何处理这些有缺陷的财产，他正在舰桥等待您的接见。”

languages.text: 「テクノマットがサーヴィターを検査して、危険はないと結論づけました。万機神の従者曰く、こういった行動は、完全には消えてなかった心のエコーがあるか、もしくは機械精霊の意志が表に出て起こるそうです。とは言え、欠陥のあるサーヴィターはクルーのタスクを非常にやりにくくします。ハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックが、欠陥の出た彼らへの対応を話し合いたいそうです。彼はブリッジであなたがお見えになるのを待っています」
languages.original_text: "The technomats inspected the servitors and concluded they pose no danger. According to the servants of the Omnissiah, such behaviour is caused either by the echoes of minds not completely eliminated or by manifestations of the machine spirits' will. Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew's tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: 「テクノマットがサーヴィターを検査して、危険はないと結論づけました。万機神の従者曰く、こういった行動は、完全には消えてなかった心のエコーがあるか、もしくは機械精霊の意志が表に出て起こるそうです。とは言え、欠陥のあるサーヴィターはクルーのタスクを非常にやりにくくします。ハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックが、欠陥の出た彼らへの対応を話し合いたいそうです。彼はブリッジであなたがお見えになるのを待っています」

languages.text: "Teknomatlar, hizmetörleri inceledi ve herhangi bir tehlike arz etmedikleri sonucuna vardı. Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarına göre böylesi bir davranışın sebebi ya zihnin yankılarının tamamen elemine edilmemesidir ya da makine ruhunun iradesinin tecellisidir. Ne olursa olsun sorun yaratan hizmetörler, mürettebatın görevlerini ciddi anlamda zorlaştırmakta. Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok, bu sorunla nasıl başa çıkacağı konusunda sizinle konuşmak istiyor. Görüşlerinizi almak için köprüde beklemekte."
languages.original_text: "The technomats inspected the servitors and concluded they pose no danger. According to the servants of the Omnissiah, such behaviour is caused either by the echoes of minds not completely eliminated or by manifestations of the machine spirits' will. Nevertheless, the faulty servitors make the crew's tasks considerably more difficult, and High Factotum Janris Danrok would like to discuss how he should deal with the defective property. He is awaiting your audience on the bridge."
